data.message: You were my replacement when we lost Tupac but now you just sound like a whiny little bitch. Trump is going to possibly save Detroit and you have nothing but negativity and fantasies of murdering people that support him you're a punk ass bitch I never thought I'd say that shit about Eminem

replies.message: Save? We could live without him here. If you are counting on a white horse to save the city good luck. It takes hard work and many people that have been contributing to this city for the past few years, we don't need anybody messing it up again.

Izabela Skonieczka the politics there will be changed. Democratic control is the biggest cause of the failures there so change the leadership and create jobs and lives will improve. Trump is an agent of change and law and order. Three things Michigan and Illinois are desperately in need of. Keeping the same people or parties in power after all the failures is going to do nothing but allow things to continue in the same lousy direction. The problems there are decades old not just a few years!
why because he says the truth
